channel.title: Characteristic classes on Exploring mathematics
channel.description: Recent content in Characteristic classes on Exploring mathematics

item.title: Secondary characteristic classes
item.description: The last semester I have been thinking very little about this blog. The reason is that I had not developed any “writing habits”, and as I started on my master thesis this semester, there have been plenty of topics to learn about. Of course, I made this blog as a tool of learning, as explaining difficult topics forces me to learn them myself, but as the learning has been more about getting an overview, I have not prioritized writing a lot.
